trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" /> class represents an inter-site transport object.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" /> representa um objeto de transporte entre sites.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether all site links are bridged.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se todos os links de site estão ligados com pontes.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates whether to bridge all site links.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> valor que indica se a ponte para todos os links de site.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if all site links are bridged; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se todos os links de site são ligados com pontes; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada ao serviço do diretório subjacente resultou em um erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não disponível.

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources that are used by the object.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos usados pelo objeto.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources that are used by the object.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos que são usados pelo objeto.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the managed resources should be released; <see langword="false" /> if only the unmanaged resources should be released.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os recursos gerenciados devem ser liberados; <see langword="false" /> se apenas os recursos não gerenciados devem ser liberados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo objeto e libera opcionalmente os recursos gerados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> object that specifies the context for the search.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> que especifica o contexto da pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType" /> object that specifies a transport type to find in the search.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType" /> que especifica um tipo de transporte a ser localizado na pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" /> object for a given directory context and transport type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" /> para um tipo de transporte e um contexto de diretório especificados.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" /> object for the item found.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" /> para o item localizado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException" /> exception is thrown if an object was not found.
trans-unit.target: Uma exceção <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException" /> será gerada se um objeto não tiver sido localizado.

trans-unit.source: The object was not found.
trans-unit.target: O objeto não foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada ao serviço do diretório subjacente resultou em um erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não disponível.

trans-unit.source: The target in the <paramref name="context" /> parameter is not a forest, configuration set, domain controller, or an AD LDS server.
trans-unit.target: O destino no parâmetro <paramref name="context" /> não é uma floresta, conjunto de configuração, controlador de domínio ou um servidor AD LDS.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="context" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="context" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The credentials that were supplied are not valid.
trans-unit.target: As credenciais fornecidas não são válidas.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="transport" /> parameter is not a valid <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType" /> value.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="transport" /> não é um valor <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType" /> válido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> para o objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object that represents the directory entry for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> que representa a entrada de diretório do objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" />.

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the replication schedule is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o agendamento de replicação é ignorado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates whether to ignore the replication schedule.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> valor que indica se deve ignorar a agenda de replicação.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the replication schedule is ignored; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a agenda de replicação será ignorada; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport.IgnoreReplicationSchedule%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is `true`, any site link availability schedules that have been configured are ignored, and all site links become always-available for replication.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport.IgnoreReplicationSchedule%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> é `true`, qualquer agendamento de disponibilidade de link de site que foram configurado é ignorado e todos os links tornam-se sempre disponível para replicação do site.

trans-unit.source: When set to `false`, any previously configured site link availability schedules go back into effect.
trans-unit.target: Quando definido como `false`, qualquer agendamentos de disponibilidade de links de site configurado anteriormente voltar em vigor.

trans-unit.source: If no site link availability schedules have been configured, setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum agendamento de disponibilidade de link de site foram configurado, a definição dessa propriedade não terá efeito.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada ao serviço do diretório subjacente resultou em um erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não disponível.

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Commits all changes to the current <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" /> object to the underlying directory store.
trans-unit.target: Confirma todas as alterações no objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" /> atual para o repositório de diretórios subjacente.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada ao serviço do diretório subjacente resultou em um erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não disponível.

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: A conta especificada não tem permissão para executar essa operação.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteLinkBridgeCollection" /> object that contains all site link bridges for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteLinkBridgeCollection" /> que contém todas as pontes de link de site para este objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteLinkBridgeCollection" /> object that contains <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge" /> objects that represent site link bridges.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteLinkBridgeCollection" /> objeto que contém <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge" /> objetos que representam as pontes de link de site.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada ao serviço do diretório subjacente resultou em um erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não disponível.

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteLinkCollection" /> object that contains all site links for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteLinkCollection" /> que contém todos os links de site para este objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteLinkCollection" /> object that contains <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> objects that represent site links.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteLinkCollection" /> objeto que contém <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> objetos que representam os links de site.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada ao serviço do diretório subjacente resultou em um erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não disponível.

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string representation of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType" /> of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma representação de cadeia de caracteres do <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType" /> do objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType" /> transport type of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o tipo de transporte <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType" /> do objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" />.

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType" /> object that represents the transport type for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType" /> que representa o tipo de transporte desse objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType" /> values that represents the transport type for this object.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType" /> valores que representa o tipo de transporte para este objeto.

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual foi descartado.
